data.text: @Corey_Feldman #Kids2

@Corey_Feldman If we'd start by giving each other a little push, forget about troubles and be a little kind ... we would stand as one.   Go outside if your tribe ....  #hurt is #universal

@TRupright @Corey_Feldman That's great, thank you! :)
@Gina_Virgilio @Corey_Feldman I plan to buy one as soon as i can. #CoreysTRUTHCampaign2 #FELDFAM

@Corey_Feldman I don’t see Terry Crews doing this . He seems very “down low.” Where as Feldman wants to tell all everyday -nothing wrong with that tho . Just saying
@Corey_Feldman @anthonyedwards Please join forces w/ @Corey_Feldman to help take down the #Pedophiles
@Corey_Feldman Get proof and lots of it, more proof of sexual abuse, we wish u luck. My wife and I wish you a safe journey.  If you would like to chat wife and I are hear

@Corey_Feldman Sorry corey I sent you a nice message but to big to send, all I was going to say my wife and I get you. Sexual abuse needs to stop. But you need to be quiet about so that don't know what hit them all, but the damage is done, so all I can say physical proof goes along way,

@Corey_Feldman quit get u r people together, and hit them with there pants down. But be ready it's not going to be easy. But evidence of the crimes that happened to all you people out there. Predators don't stay with one person they do many, find the many, then you have a stronger case, and by

@Corey_Feldman No lawyer will turn down physical proof, you can get alot of people that's been sexual abuse, and turn all the names in. But you made a mistake, you let all those predators know what's going on, and know there preparing for anything. If your true about this you need to keep this

@Corey_Feldman Corey my wife and I grew up watching your movies, we herd the mistake and the he'll you and your best friend went through. No man woman or child should ever be sexual abused. When people have money they have power, and worse lawyers, so the best help I can give you is this proof.
@Corey_Feldman Not to take away what we’re really after here and that is the pedophiles!!!!!
@Corey_Feldman YES!!!!!!!
@Corey_Feldman Terry reached out? Thats awesome. I was hoping you guys would join forces soon. 😎
@Corey_Feldman again, I say encourage Hollywood to #wearwhite to call attention the loss of innocence from so many young people in the industry. Best thoughts and wishes with you sir!
@Corey_Feldman good job
@Corey_Feldman Its the start Corey but act straight. Some weird music concert exhibition is not helping

@Corey_Feldman Awesome! Terry Crews Did say he was taken advantage of too....like you Corey!! It's great to have more Support! 
#IStandwithCoreyandTerry 
#JusticeforMcDonaldfour 
#Churchtoo
@Corey_Feldman Joinining forces will make your voices louder! I hope someone from @terrycrews teams reaches out to you Corey
@Corey_Feldman @terrycrews
@MyChristmasGirl @Corey_Feldman He was an athlete and became an actor. Most known as Julius from everybody hates Chris TV show.

@Corey_Feldman Sorry @Corey_Feldman, that to get any recognition on sexual abuse in Hollywood, you have to be female or non white. I have followed your story for years. You and Haim were two of my favorite actors growing up. Thank you for being strong and taking this stand!  Love you!
@Corey_Feldman Join forces and make your voices louder! @terrycrews #ISTANDWITHCOREY #FELDFAM  #EnoughisEnough
@Corey_Feldman You and Terry would make a good team fighting back against predators in Hollywood.
@MyChristmasGirl @Corey_Feldman A positive, true Renaissance man who is fighting against evil in Hollywood just like Corey.  Google him.
@Corey_Feldman Hugs and kisses, Corey!!!  The men need to stand firm together to help other male survivors  overcome!

@Corey_Feldman I hope your openness to teamwork unites stronger and influential voices. @terrycrews 
Together the force of good is more powerful. Enough division. That is what they want and expect.  Show them enough is enough. Respect to all you have both done already. Fingers crossed.
@Corey_Feldman Let me guess, someone famous like Hollywood or sports.
@Corey_Feldman Who's Terry Crews?
@Corey_Feldman Thank you for your undying effort. Keep the pressure on!
@Corey_Feldman Name names or gtfo, bro.
@Corey_Feldman Awesome
@Corey_Feldman So much yes to this!
@Corey_Feldman Stay strong! Praying for you!
